Text: SoCalGas Contracted Marketer Deadline for November Cc This is to notify you that the deadline to add or remove customers from your contracted marketer pool for November is close of business Monday October Please fax your Form with your accompanying list of adds andor drops to me at fax number Attached is the Form for your convenience Thanks and call me if you have questions Mary ph fx CMFORMDOC CMFORMDOC
Southern California Gas Company Contracted MarketersDrop andor Add Deadline DateSouthern California Gas Company Contracted MarketersDrop andor Add Deadline Date CMFORMDOC

IMPORTANT NOTICE Change of GIMBThe attached was posted on GasSelect Please make sure you read so that you become familiar with the new standby procurement penalty rules for the GIMB tariff In a nut shell Penalty is now calculated at of highest daily border price index at the SoCal border The charge should begin from the first day of the flow month and end five days prior to the start of each corresponding imbalance trading period The charge will be posted at least one day in advance of each corresponding imbalance trading period Since this became effective on June SoCalGas will determine the highest daily border price during the period of June through July and post it no later than July Customers are assessed this penalty for any underdeliveries outside the tolerance for trades that take place from July for June imbalances Please call me if you have questions regarding this new GIMB calculation Thanks Mary ph fx RGPDF GIMBSPDF RGPDF GIMBSPDF
